text: Boola; “Itse ebasomele abia Nyasaye wenyu omulesi yakania. Nabo ni mbu; “Mulamutsokasia nende shiosishiosi tawe. Ne Abebusi benyu mubakholele amalayi. Ne mulera Abana benyu shichila obutakha tawe, efwe khubetsanga omukabo enywe ninabo. Ne mlasita ahambi nende amakhuwa keshifwolo tawe, akalolekhana nende akefisile. Ne mulera Omundu wa Nyasaye yakana okhwira, halali khubwatoto.” Kano ni amachelo kaye khwinywe kakhaba kario mwara mubwongo
